features: REST API endpoints for query, batch, session, reasoning, history, status
notes: Electron backend must provide all documented REST endpoints, mapped to internal modules.
Authentication and role-based access must be enforced at the API layer.
WebSocket server must be integrated for notifications and real-time events.
Error handling must follow documented formats and codes.
Configuration options must be exposed and documented for Electron deployment.
